info.title: Zvanu parvaldnieks
info.description: Zvanu Parvaldnieks is a mobile virtual PBX service for LMT mobile subscribers.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallstartedEvent is received during the start of the call.

get.description: Retreive a single employee object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the employee.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the employee

get.description: Retreive a single employee group object by providing an ID.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the employee group
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the employee group

get.description: Retreive a single call recording by providing an ID.

parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the recording
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the recording

get.description: Retreive Call recordings. Additionaly API consumer may filter the returned records based on specific number or employee involved in the call (source, destination or contact_id), as well as direction to filter out only incoming or outgoing calls or only calls made in specified date range (date_range).

parameters.name: record_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the recording.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the recording

parameters.name: initial_record_id
parameters.description: Initial record ID for querying only newly created records.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Initial record ID for querying only newly created records

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit how many results to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The number which call was placed to.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number which call was placed to

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The number of calling party.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The number of calling party

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: "in" or "out" to indicate if the call was incoming or outgoing.
parameters.x-ms-summary: "in" or "out" to indicate if the call was incoming or outgoing

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Starting date in the filtered date range

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.
parameters.x-ms-summary: End date in the filtered date range

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when new call recording is created

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: "in" or "out" to indicate if the call was incoming or outgoing.

parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the Employee involved in the call

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Starting date in the filtered date range.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Starting date in the filtered date range

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.

get.description: Retreive Voicemail messages. Additionaly API consumer may filter the returned records based on contact_id, source, box_id or date_range to limit the result to only those messages that are left for specific employee, voicemail box, from specific number or in requested date range.

parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail message.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Unique ID of the voicemail message

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The number of calling party.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the voicemail box.

parameters.name: date_from

parameters.x-ms-summary: Starting date in the filtered date range

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: End date in the filtered date range.
parameters.x-ms-summary: End date in the filtered date range

post.description: Request the start of new call by sending a request to a device.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallConnectedEvent is received during a moment when call is answered.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallConnectedEvent is received during a moment when call is answered.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallCompletedEvent is received during a moment when call has ended.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallCompletedEvent is received during a moment when call has ended.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when event VoicemailMessageCreatedEvent is received during a moment when caller has left a voicemail.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when event VoicemailCreated Event is received during a moment when caller has left a voicemail.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when event VoicemailDeleted Event is received during a moment when user has deleted a voicemail message.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the voicemail when event VoicemailMessageDeletedEvent is received during a moment when user has deleted a voicemail message.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when event LostCallerCreatedEvent is received during a moment when call does not get answered and gets registered as lost.

post.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when event LostCallerCreatedEvent is received during a moment when call does not get answered and gets registered as lost.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when event LostCallerUpdatedEvent is received during a moment when another unsuccesful call attempt is received from the same number, so lost call record attempts and last_contact fields get updated with a new number and timestamp.

post.description: Provides event with data payload data about the call when event LostCallerUpdatedEvent is received during a moment when another unsuccesful call attempt is received from the same number, so lost call record attempts and last_contact fields get updated with a new number and timestamp.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event LostCallerDeletedEvent is received during a moment when lost call gets called back from employee or gets answered later in repeated call from the same caller.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event LostCallerDeletedEvent is received during a moment when lost call gets called back from employee or gets answered later in repeated call from the same caller.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallRecorded is received during a moment when call recording gets created.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallRecorded is received during a moment when call recording gets created.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallTransfered is received during a moment when call gets transfered to a third party either by a blind transfer of attended transfer.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallTransfered is received during a moment when call gets transfered to a third party either by a blind transfer of attended transfer.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallStarted event is received during the start of the call.

post.description: Provides event with data payload about the call when event CallStarted event is received during the start of the call.

get.description: Retreive Employee groups data. Additionaly API consumer may filter the returned records based on contact_id, to limit the result to only those groups, which have particular Employee as a member.

parameters.description: Unique ID of the group.

parameters.name: initial_group_id

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the Employee.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many results to retrieve.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Limit how many results to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Used to specify from which result we want the data to retrieve

get.x-ms-trigger-hint: Triggers when new employee group is created
